data.description:
Darts delivers exactly what a VR game should, an experience to remember.” - Thumb Culture, Thumb Culture Platinum Award

Play all your favorite Darts games: ‘01 Series, Double Out ‘01 Series, Count Up, and Cricket!

All skill levels welcome, with Easy and Medium aim assist to suit your throw! Plus, Hard Mode offers Pros the most realistic Darts experience in VR!

Pick from 65+ classic and fantasy designs to suit every dartist, each uniquely weighted in our custom physics engine for different throws and game strategies.

Explore 4 immersive halls: UK Pub, Mars, Beachside, & Vegas, with more coming soon!

Rock out to curated hall music or the YouTube-powered jukebox, with full multiplayer music!

+ 4 Halls
+ 65 Darts
+ 3 Levels of Aim Assist
+ 5 Challengeable NPC Pros in Each Hall
+ Pass and Play

changelog.change_log:
IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Now with support for Mixed Reality! Enable this via settings while in a hall!
🎯 Look through your VR headset and see the real world while you dart it up. Place the dartboard to bring up a dart experience never seen before in a mixed reality environment!
 
BUG FIXES
🎯MR Related fixes with hand tracking. 

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? https://help.forevrgames.com/

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Now with support for Mixed Reality!  Enable this via settings while in a hall!
🎯 Look through your VR headset and see the real world while you dart it up.  Place the dartboard to bring up a dart experience never seen before in a mixed reality environment!

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support?

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Addressed various bugs 🐛

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 New Help button added to pause menu. Players can now contact support from within the game! 
🎯  Daily Spinner! Spin the wheel in the lobby for a daily coin grant!

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯  Fixed an issue preventing players over level 40 from interacting with popup windows!

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 Darts Royale! A new game mode with two unique styles of play, Frenzy and Challenge mode, you’ll be racing against the clock to stake your claim on the global leaderboard!
🎯 Releasing alongside Darts Royale are five new throwables! Two playing cards, Joker and Ace, and three Ninja Stars! Unlock them by playing and achieving high scores in Darts Royale!
🎯 Started investigating a Leprechaun’s trail 🌈

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support?

ForeVR Darts v1.8 brings changes and improvements to the game, including our most-requested feature yet: MEDIA SHARE! 
 
WHAT’S NEW
🎯 YouTube Media Share! Learn more about it in our upcoming developer post.
🎯 Miscellaneous bug fixes and under-the-hood improvements 
 
YOUTUBE MEDIA SHARE!
You asked, we delivered! Now, the host in a multiplayer match has the option to share their media with the party. 
Please be aware that this feature is in early access, so we’re still ironing out some flaws! We’re currently aware of some issues, like: 
- If an ad plays before a video, the video will be out-of-sync until the host changes the video
- Some text may clip out of buttons in certain languages
- When the host leaves a party *after* turning off media sharing, the remaining party members may experience issues turning on media share. This issue doesn’t occur if the host doesn’t turn off media sharing before leaving the party. 
 
SUPPORT
🎯 Found a bug, or experiencing an issue? Reach out to our team at help.forevrgames.com!

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Easy, Medium and Hard throw difficulties have been renamed to Full, Medium and No Assist.
🎯 Multiplayer stability improvements! 
🎯 NPC challenger throw speeds have been sped up.
🎯 Cricket overmark added.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue preventing players from joining Public Multiplayer rooms.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue affecting NPC challenger animations. 
🎯 Fixed! Resolved various issues preventing the pointer reticle from selecting buttons.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue in Pass & Play Cricket where scoreboards were flipped.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue where the room code number pad blocked the menu screen while seated.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue where scoreboards became mixed when players joined late.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue where scoreboard rounds appeared incorrect when players joined late.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved an issue where footpad locations appeared while not tilting the thumbstick.
🎯 Fixed! Corrected XP and Coin multipliers on the Main Menu screens.
🎯 Fixed! Resolved various localization translations.

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support? help.forevrgames.com

What’s New 
🎯 CRICKET! 🦗
🎯 New poster in the ForeVR Pub with Cricket rules
🎯 New Welsh flag dart
🎯 New England flag dart
🎯 New Scotland flag dart
🎯 New Ukraine flag dart
🎯 New Green Glitter dart
🎯 Avatar tutorial for new users

Improvements
🎯 Bullseye Beach optimizations
🎯 Fixed an issue where beam finger appeared while holding a dart
🎯 Fixed an issue preventing players from hiding their avatar
🎯 Fixed an issue when changing media player volume was not reflected in the settings menu
🎯 Bug Fixes
🎯 Fixed issue where occasionally in multiplayer games, players’ scores will appear flipped (i.e. Player 2’s score will appear under player 1, and vice versa) on the scoreboard. 

Known Issues
🎯 When a player joins a room through the party menu, if that friend is in a different region, it will appear that the player joins a different room. If playing with friends in different regions, use Room Codes to avoid this issue! 
🎯 We’re implementing a hotfix very soon addressing these issues. 
🎯 If you run into any bugs (… other than Crickets 🦗), head to forevrgames.com/support!

What’s New 
🎯 CRICKET! 🦗
🎯 New poster in the ForeVR Pub with Cricket rules
🎯 New Welsh flag dart
🎯 New England flag dart
🎯 New Scotland flag dart
🎯 New Ukraine flag dart
🎯 New Green Glitter dart
🎯 Avatar tutorial for new users

Improvements
🎯 Bullseye Beach optimizations
🎯 Fixed an issue where beam finger appeared while holding a dart
🎯 Fixed an issue preventing players from hiding their avatar
🎯 Fixed an issue when changing media player volume was not reflected in the settings menu
🎯 Bug Fixes

Known Issues
🎯 When a player joins a room through the party menu, if that friend is in a different region, it will appear that the player joins a different room. If playing with friends in different regions, use Room Codes to avoid this issue! 
🎯 Occasionally in multiplayer games, players’ scores will appear flipped (i.e. Player 2’s score will appear under player 1, and vice versa) on the scoreboard. 
🎯 We’re implementing a hotfix very soon addressing these issues. 
🎯 If you run into any bugs (… other than Crickets 🦗), head to forevrgames.com/support!

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 New Welsh flag dart
🎯 New England flag dart
🎯 New Scotland flag dart
🎯 New Ukraine flag dart
🎯 New green glitter dart
🎯 Avatar tutorial (new users only)

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Beach hall optimizations
🎯 Fixed an issue where beam finger appeared while holding a dart
🎯 Fixed an issue preventing players from hiding their avatar
🎯 Fixed an issue when changing media player volume not reflected in settings menu

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

COMING SOON
🎯 Cricket!

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 New hall: Bullseye Beach!
🎯 5 unique beach themed darts
🎯 5 new NPCs added to the Bullseye Beach lineup, see anyone you recognize?
🎯 Lunar New Year celebration ends

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Bug fixes
🎯 Updated Media Player: Our Jukebox now features the playlists you love PLUS help articles and creator content

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Darts uses Oculus’ high frequency hand tracking and there is a known issue with a slight increase in jitter when you hold the dart with hands, particularly under low light conditions. Oculus is in the process of working on a fix.
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 New hall: Bullseye Beach!
🎯 5 unique beach themed darts
🎯 5 new NPCs added to the Bullseye Beach lineup, see anyone you recognize?
🎯 Lunar New Year celebration ends

IMPROVEMENTS
🎯 Bug fixes
🎯 Updated Media Player: Our Jukebox now features the playlists you love PLUS help articles and creator content

KNOWN ISSUES
🎯 Darts uses Oculus’ high frequency hand tracking and there is a known issue with a slight increase in jitter when you hold the dart with hands, particularly under low light conditions. Oculus is in the process of working on a fix.
🎯 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎯 New game mode: Count Up
🎯 Lunar New Year lobby decor

IMPROVEMENTS:
🎯 ‘Clear Darts’ option added to settings to clear darts from the board/surroundings
🎯 Height Adjustment slider added to settings to increase height for shorter and/or seated players
🎯 Mic mute/unmute toggle added to settings to easily mute while using hand tracking
🎯 Lobby balloons now respawn every 24 hours
🎯 Bug fixes

IMPROVEMENTS:
❇️ Additional localization translations
🐞 Bug fixes

----------------------------------------

Welcome to ForeVR Darts! 🎯
We are so excited for you to play our game! Be sure to check out our favorite features:

🎯 Challenge an in-game NPC in solo play or while you wait for other players to join multiplayer matches
🎯 Play one of four game types: 101, 201, 301, or 501 single or double out
🎯 Level up in Pub Hall, Mars Hall, or Vegas Hall
🎯 Head to the Pro Shop and try out our 55 unique darts before you load up your personal arsenal
🎯 Create a Private Room to play with friends with Room Codes or make new friends in Public Matches
🎯 Pass and Play with family and friends at home
🎯 Rank up and track your best scores with in-game leaderboards.
🎯 Pop some Balloons to practice your throw and unlock achievements
🎯 Choose your own playlist at the jukebox

FOREVR VIPS:
🎯Five new exclusive darts for ForeVR VIP members
🎯Launch ForeVR Bowl from the main doorway
🎯How-to Score poster in the Pub Hall

WHAT’S NEW

🎯 Five new exclusive darts for ForeVR VIP members
🎯 Launch ForeVR Bowl from the main doorway
 
IMPROVEMENTS:

❇️ Additional localization translations
